bannerDescription: Xone Chain is a modular Layer-1 blockchain platform built on the Ethereum protocol, and a leading Behavior Value Incentive (BVI) blockchain.
enterYourEmail: Subscribe and get in touch with us!
hellowXoneDesc3: Efficient, flexible, and scalable modular design.
hellowXoneTitle6: Start running your own Xone node
hellowXoneDesc5: Xone is a high-performance, EVM-compatible, and scalable blockchain platform based on Cosmos modular architecture.
hellowXoneDesc6: Easily deploy and run your Xone node to participate in network consensus and validation for greater rewards.
hellowXoneDesc7: Provide equal opportunities, empowering everyone through transparency, lower barriers, and inclusive access for sustainable economic growth.
hellowXoneDesc8: Deploy your app on Xone Chain and join one of the fastest-growing EVM ecosystems.
exploreNatureDesc: Discover a mission-driven ecosystem — open, adaptable, and driving future blockchain innovation.
governanceDesc: Xone introduces on-chain Behavior Value Incentives to deliver fair, dynamic rewards, recognizing and incentivizing community contributions to sustain ecosystem growth and collaboration.
exploreTitle: Explore Xone, all in one place
exploreDesc: Manage your accounts, assets, and nodes in one place — and explore even more possibilities.
startTitle: Start now with us, endless progress!
startDesc: Join us to co-create value — focus on impactful contributions that deliver real returns. Track your blockchain impact and join our journey.
more1description: We build open collaborative bridges with industry partners to drive technological innovation and ecosystem co-creation, injecting new vitality into the future of global cryptocurrency.
more2description: Xone continually expands its global business network, actively partnering with leading projects, enterprises, and institutions to explore diverse blockchain use cases together.
more3: Wave 2025: Embracing Hong Kong’s crypto future
more3description: Looking back on the Wave 2025 summit in Hong Kong, we are grateful for the opportunity to connect with industry leaders, innovators, and fellow visionaries of crypto’s future.
more4description: Under the spotlight, Xone showcases strong tech capabilities and brand influence, continuously attracting global attention and acclaim.
more5: The limitless possibilities of Web3: Xone's vision
more5description: Xone's mission is not only to build an efficient public chain but also to drive sustainable Web3 ecosystem growth through deep tech-business integration.
more6: Discuss future challenges, opportunities, and innovations with top industry voices
more6description: Xone joined the BNB Chain AMA to explore the revival of public chains with various Web3 project representatives, sharing deep insights on future challenges and opportunities.
more7: Xone as the exclusive title sponsor of W2140 Bangkok
more7description: Gathering industry leaders to explore Web3 trends and opportunities together.
more8description: Join them to explore AI-driven frontier innovations in decentralized finance.
dialogueMessage2: Your contributions directly reward you, driving ecosystem growth.
